import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Header from '../Header' import Footer from '../Footer' import './home.sass' const Home = () => { return (

Manufacturing Turnarounds is an Operational Turnaround Consulting group. We specialize in turning around the operations of Manufacturers who have fallen out of favor with Lenders, Private Equity Sponsors, or Institutional Investors. While some clients prefer to reach out to us directly when they wish to improve operations, more often than not we are called upon by Banks, Restructuring Groups, or Individual Chief Restructuring Officers acting on behalf of their clients.

Work With Us

Assessments

Our assessments provide both the company and its financial constituents meaningful and actionable insights.

Restructuring & Turnaround

We work to make short-term tactical adjustments, then develop a strategic plan and acquire buy-in from stakeholders.

Interim Management

We lead companies through critical times and create a roadmap to success that we hand off seamlessly to new management.

Performance Improvement

We seek to understand the organization in its entirety as we identify, prioritize and execute improvements for maximum impact.

) } export default Home
